description:
With Power BI, dashboards help you keep a finger on the pulse of your business. This course empowers you with power BI capabilities and tend to create your own BI solution intuitively without much dependence on IT. Exploring the Q&A features would be one of the enhanced features that this course focus on. Power BI for Excel Course ensures that you get accurate, complete and timely reports from your enterprise system.

Whether you are new to Excel or an advanced user, this Excel courses will cover what you need to know to become an Excel power user

This course is intended for the data analysts and end users who are willing to explore the Power business intelligence tools in Microsoft Excel 2013. This training is best suited for all business professionals: data analysts, developers, IT professionals, project leads, and project managers.
title: Meet the all new BI Avatar - Power BI
